title: César Chávez-Riva
text:
César Humberto Chávez-Riva Gálvez (born 22 November 1964) is a Peruvian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a> and former player who played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He is the current assistant manager of <a href="Escuela%20Municipal%20Deportivo%20Binacional">Binacional</a>.
Career.
Born in <a href="Lima">Lima</a>, Chávez Riva played the majority of his career for <a href="Universitario%20de%20Deportes">Universitario</a>. Chávez Riva made 12 appearances for the <a href="Peru%20national%20football%20team">Peru national football team</a> from 1986 to 1989. He participated in the <a href="1987%20Copa%20Am%C3%A9rica">1987</a> and <a href="1989%20Copa%20Am%C3%A9rica">1989 Copa América</a>s.
